org.mentawai.cript
Class MentaCript

java.lang.Object
  org.mentawai.cript.MentaCript

public class MentaCript
extends Object

Class that cript end decript values. EX: MentaCript.cript("123") // returns DtdvnYls4L4= MentaCript.decript("DtdvnYls4L4=") // returns 123

Author:
Robert Willian Gil
